body_html:
These include scalar tests for the module_tests in common_nn. I believe all that is left to test before enabling scalars is the modules in test_nn.

The only example that seemed broken is PReLU; there's an explanation for the fix.
body_text:
These include scalar tests for the module_tests in common_nn.  I believe all that is left to test before enabling scalars is the modules in test_nn.
The only example that seemed broken is PReLU; there's an explanation for the fix.
body:
These include scalar tests for the module_tests in common_nn.  I believe all that is left to test before enabling scalars is the modules in test_nn.

The only example that seemed broken is PReLU; there's an explanation for the fix.
